notesStmt.note: Dimensions of original manuscript: 410 x 260 (250 x 135) mm.
Laid, non-European paper; no visible chain lines.
"Waqf" is written across the top of one leaf and across the rubrications on another leaf.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

msContents.summary: One bifolium, not consecutive pages, from a religious poem.

author.persName: Bāz̲il, Muhammad Rafīʻ ibn Muḥammad al-Mashhadī, -1712
باذل، مهمد رفيع بن محمد المشهدى،

supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation added in pencil, upper outer corners as if the leaves were to be read left to right (1A-2B); catchwords every verso, lower left. The digital images have been sorted so that they read in left-to-right order; foliation therefore is 2B-1A.

layoutDesc.layout: Written in 23 lines in four columns.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

origin.p: Item is undated, but perhaps produced in the 17th century.

history.provenance: Gift of Dr. Robert H. Dyson, Jr. in 2006
